page.title: 04SERVICES
page.content:
People living in rural areas such as these are conscious of their distance from service headquarters, such as in case of emergency.
The nearest Fire, Ambulance and Police centres are at Penrith, some 8km away. Although staff of these services do very well in emergencies, winter conditions can from time to time make rural isolation total.
Our area is well served by the North West Electricity Board, and Water Board, most (but not all) homes being connected to both services.
Refuse is collected weekly by Eden District Council, and the local Parish Council provides for such services as street lighting where considered necessary.
